title: Easy Creole Jambalaya (330 calories)
directions: 1. In 4- to 5-quart crockery cooker combine undrained tomatoes, chicken broth, onion, tomato paste, Cajun seasoning, Worcestershire sauce and red pepper.Stir KELLOGG’S SPECIAL K Cereal Multi-Grain, chicken and sausage into tomato mixture. Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 5 to 6 hours or on high-heat setting for 2 1/2 to 3 hours. 3. Stir in rice, shrimp and bell pepper. Cover and let stand for 20 minutes or until rice is tender. Stir before serving.
ingredients: 1 can (14 oz., 1 3/4 cups) reduced-sodium chicken broth
1 tablespoon salt free Cajun Creole seasoning
3 cups Kellogg’s® Special K® Cereal Multi-Grain (crushed to 1 1/2 cups)
1 1/4 pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
1/4 pound low-fat, smoked, fully-cooked sausage, cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices
1/4 pound frozen, cooked, peeled and deveined shrimp, thawed
